attributes.action: keep greyhound racing at Wimbledon stadium
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to keep greyhound racing at Wimbledon greyhound stadium.
Merton council are proposing a deal between galliard homes and afc wimbledon to build a football stadium and housing on the site of the greyhound stadium.
We are the only greyhound track left in the capital and believe its important to our sport that this track remains.
